      Returns:
      true if it's valid, false otherwise.

    • getNormalizedUid

      public static String getNormalizedUid(II ii)
      Normalizes an UID. The II instance should have been validated before.
      Parameters:
      ii - The validated identifier to normalizes.
      Returns:
      the normalized UID identifier.

    • getNormalizedCx

      public static String getNormalizedCx(II ii)
      Normalizes an HL7 V2.5 CX field. The code is escaped, the code system ID shall be an OID so escaping it shouldn't be needed.
      Parameters:
      ii - The validated identifier to normalizes.
      Returns:
      the normalized CX field.

      Returns:
      the qualified identifier.
